description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter-based frontend application. It defines the main app widget, a home page widget, and constructs a simple user interface displaying a loading message with a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that builds the root MaterialApp, setting title, theme, and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget that represents the main page with a title property.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: The state class for MyHomePage, building the UI with an AppBar and centered loading message with indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point of the application, calling runApp with MyApp instance.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for each widget class: MyApp, MyHomePage, and _MyHomePageState.
